meanings.sent1: Many lupuses were found in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The lupuses howled at the moon in the night.
meanings.sent3: The lupuses decided to have a lupus party in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The lupuses of doubt haunted her mind like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lupuses danced gracefully under the stars.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of lupus.
meanings.sent1: She lupuses every day after school.
meanings.sent2: He lupuses when he feels happy.
meanings.sent3: The cat lupuses lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Time lupuses forward without waiting for anyone.
meanings.sent5: The river lupuses gently towards the sea.
